https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tgUES8GDJdZrLitIXpSq1vKORBE.jpg Juan “Accidentes” Dominguez is on his biggest case ever. On behalf of twelve Nicaraguan banana workers he is tackling Dole Food in a ground-breaking legal battle for their use of a banned pesticide that was known by the company to cause sterility. Can he beat the giant, or will the corporation get away with it? Bananas!*
